Math guy with hacking skills at the Norwegian marketplace FINN.no and
  at the machine learning startup Arctic Datalab.  I am also doing an industrial phd
  in statistics at University of Oslo where I focus on personalization, bayesian statistics
  and bandits. Working on personalization systems and other machine learning tasks
  using behaviour, image and text.  Background from mathematics, statistics and financial
  modeling.
